Citation Integration

Posted by Shannon, Lorem on January 02, 2019
Citation Integration

Now that you’ve done your research, it’s time to cite your sources. We sampled several academic papers to show you a variety of ways you can integrate sources into your own writing. Use these strategies to diversify your citation methods and show your readers how your sources contributed to your work!.
